front.title: Provider-Provisioned CPE: IPv4 Connectivity Access in the context of IPv4 address exhaustion

abstract.t: This memo proposes a solution, based on fractional addresses, to face the IPv4 public address exhaustion. It details the solution and presents a mock-up implementation, with the results of tests that validate the concept. Finally, it makes a comparison with the alternative Carrier-Grade NAT (CG-NAT) solutions.
